name: OBV Divergence & StochRSI Momentum Strategy
description: Daily-bar momentum strategy for U.S. mid-cap equities. Longs are opened when bullish OBV divergence aligns with a StochRSI(14) breakout (>0.8). Positions are sized to risk 2 % of equity, use a 3 % trailing stop from the highest close, and target 6 % profit or indicator/trend deterioration exits (RSI<50 or close<20-EMA).
